front.title: IEEE Standard for Ethernet--Amendment 8:Physical Layer Specifications and Management Parameters for 2.5 Gb/s, 5 Gb/s, and 10 Gb/s Automotive Electrical Ethernet
front.keyword: 2.5GBASE-T1; 5GBASE-T1; 10GBASE-T1; Ethernet; IEEE 802.3ch; MASTER-SLAVE; Medium Dependent Interface; Physical Coding Sublayer; Physical Layer; Physical Medium Attachment
front.abstract: This amendment to IEEE Std 802.3-2018 adds physical layer specifications and management parameters for 2.5 Gb/s, 5 Gb/s, and 10 Gb/s operation on a single balanced pair of conductors suitable for automotive applications.
